- :rocket: I'm an **Aeronautical and Astronautical Science and Technology** postgraduate student.
- 🔭 I’m currently working on **communication payload of satellites**.
- 🌱 I’m currently learning **Zynq development**.

### 📚 Repositories

#### SoC/FPGA

- **[intelligent_RF_ZCU111](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/intelligent_RF_ZCU111)**  
毕设，使用OpenCV在Zynq PS实现图像识别，识别结果通过PL端RFdc使用BPSK调制发送
- **[rfnoc-qpsk](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/rfnoc-qpsk)**  
使用UHD-RFNoC，使得USRP-E312可以在FPGA内部解调QPSK信号

#### Python

- **[aio_webcrawler](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/aio_webcrawler)**  
网页爬虫
- **[DSLWP-Downlink-Proxy](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/DSLWP-Downlink-Proxy)**  
龙江二号地面站配套客户端程序
- **[Py_Beidou_RDSS](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/Py_Beidou_RDSS)**  
PyQt5实现Beidou_RDSS模块的上位机程序
- **[2019_MCM_D_Cellular_automaton](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/2019_MCM_D_Cellular_automaton)**  
元胞自动机，实现数学建模美赛2019年D题算法仿真

#### C++

- **[opencv_laser](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/opencv_laser)**  
基于opencv的激光三角法测量系统
- **[openGL_3D_Reconstruction](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/openGL_3D_Reconstruction)**  
OpenGL实现3D模型展示

#### C#

- **[Automotive_relay_monitor](https://github.com/ArtisticZhao/Automotive_relay_monitor)**  
用于电动汽车上大功率继电器的智能检测模块的上位机
